definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: son of Eber, descendant of Shem (DHM in MV comp. his name in Arab. tradition, viz. Ḳaḥtân: the √ √ qh.t. and wqt. being both expl. in Muḥîṭ by d.rb strike, beat; v. Lane:1777ff.)—Ge 10:25, Ge 10:26, Ge 10:29 = 1Ch 1:19, 1Ch 1:20, 1Ch 1:23, ‘father’ of various tribes of Yemen; LXX IeKtan.
